employees.name: Shmorgan
employees.bio: Morgan has been the director of Nashville Kennels for the past 5 years. She enjoys dachshunds, front end web development, pina colodas, and getting caught in the rain. She designed this webpage, and may or may not have spent too many hours outside of class tweaking the CSS.

employees.name: Karl Barn Net
employees.bio: Karl has been a dog trainer for Nashville Kennels for the past 2 years. He recieved his education from dogtraining.net, and specializes in calming aggresive breeds. When he isn't training, you can find him being the coolest dad in town.

employees.name: Jake Deeds
employees.bio: Jake is Nashville Kennel's senior dog groomer, and has been grooming dogs for over 15 years. He specializes in doodles, noodles, and caboodles. When not grooming dogs, you can find Mr. Deeds making psychedelic photoshop creations.

employees.name: Kelli Bear
employees.bio: Kelli is in charge of all social media opperations at Nashville Kennels. She recieved a degree from Rhode Island School of Twitter, and specializes in dog photography. When not running our social media platflorms, Kelli can be found drumming and roughing up her cat, Sweetie.
